alert.note: Alert for Lafayette; Little River; Miller (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 31 at 3:23PM CST until February 01 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...A cold rain this afternoon will gradually transition to light freezing rain by this evening into the overnight hours as temperatures slowly fall to near or just below freezing. Total ice accumulations of up to a tenth of an inch is expected through Wednesday morning. * WHERE...Portions of south central and southwest Arkansas and northeast Texas. * WHEN...Until noon CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
